Banner.Description: A Software Engineer with a real passion for developing web and mobile applications. My experience includes designing and developing backend and mobile applications, and diving into cloud solutions with AWS. I have a strong foundation in Java, JavaScript, Python and enjoy using my extensive knowledge to solve problems and build something meaningful. Currently exploring exciting opportunities to continue growing and making a positive impact with technology.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: Over the span of 2+ years in the software industry, I have committed myself to continuous learning and innovation. My journey began as a software engineer at Accenture, where I contributed to enhancing application functionality, ensuring both quality and efficiency. In parallel, my role as a Graduate Research Assistant at the University of Missouri, Columbia, allowed me to spearhead a project to provide insights into social behaviors of Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) individuals .
While my core competencies revolve around Java, Python, JavaScript, AWS, I've had the opportunity to work with a plethora of technologies and tools, and I'm always eager to explore more.
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Graduate Research Assistant
Description: Led the development of a transformative digital tool, a custom Android Wear OS app, to improve healthcare diagnostics for individuals with Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD), demonstrating a passion for creating impactful, user-centric solutions

Pioneered a scalable cloud-based audio processing platform on AWS, showcasing deep expertise in cloud software development and a commitment to leveraging market-leading development platforms for business solutions.

Implemented a Spring Boot backend for secure data management and efficient retrieval from AWS RDS, highlighting proficiency in developing robust backend systems that ensure data integrity and security.

Developed a real-time analytics dashboard using Angular, enabling clinicians to monitor patient progress effectively, reflecting a strong foundation in front-end technologies and a dedication to delivering delightful and secure user experiences.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Associate Software Engineer
Description: Optimized backend performance for key applications by integrating advanced Java Spring frameworks, contributing to significant improvements in application performance and user satisfaction, showcasing a talent for debugging and enhancing software through CI lifecycle management
Automated discrepancy reporting in an application handling 10,000+ invoices daily, reducing invoice errors by 40% and achieving significant cost savings.
Significantly reduced manual workload by automating API keys synchronizations , leveraging AWS SDK for direct fetching from AWS Parameter Store
Resolved 1000+ application incidents, averaging a 20-minute response time, enhancing user experience.
Engaged in Agile practices with daily stand-ups, focusing on progress updates and planning, contributing to enhanced team communication and efficient task management

FeatureProjects.Title: My Signature Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) Analytics Dashboard
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: An advanced Analytics Dashboard meticulously crafted using Angular with a Flask backend. The data-driven interface retrieves insights directly from AWS RDS. It showcases heart rate analysis, a detailed breakdown of total spoken time daily, and a comprehensive time series visualization of the data.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Advanced Audio Recorder for Android Wearables
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A dedicated application for Android smartwatches designed to seamlessly record voice data. Key features include automatic transfer of recorded audio files to AWS S3 using AWS Amplify upon stopping the recording, integrated ❤ heart rate data capture, and smart reminders that notify users to initiate or halt recordings at preset intervals.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Architecture Design for Audio Processing
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A robust AWS architecture designed for audio processing. Audio files uploaded to S3 trigger a Lambda via SQS. The Lambda then processes the audio using AWS SageMaker, storing the results back in S3 Buckets. This scalable and fault-tolerant design ensures efficient handling of multiple audio files simultaneously.

OtherProjects.Title: More personal projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Wellness Diagnostic Center Dashboard
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A comprehensive dashboard for Wellness Diagnostic Center, designed to efficiently manage and display lab test bill details. This system offers functionalities like bill addition, display within specific date ranges, and user authentication for enhanced security.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Voice Recorder App for Android Phones
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A sophisticated Android app designed for voice recording. Crafted with Java, it boasts features such as user authentication, automatic transfers to AWS S3, and an integrated media player for playback.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: REST API Projects
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A Java-based application suite featuring the Assembly AI Audio Transcription for efficient speech-to-text conversion, and the Football API - Total Goals by Team, a tool for insightful football data analysis. Both projects showcase advanced RESTful API integration, catering to needs in audio transcription and sports analytics.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: TIC TAC TOE Game
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Dive into the timeless strategy with my interactive Tic Tac Toe game, crafted with modern JavaScript. This project provides users with a seamless, nostalgic gaming experience. Leveraging sleek design and responsive features, the game is a testament to my capability in turning simple concepts into engaging digital experiences.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message
